Maharlika Highway passes the outskirts of the town. Some buses bound for Manila pass by San Pablo and there are jeepneys to Calamba City.

Sampaloc Lake is beautiful, almost in the city centre - good markets, great old church - nearby are the other 6 lakes, Villa Escudero (worth a visit), and Alaminos (on the main road about 7 km before San Pablo) which is the departure point for Hidden Valley springs (also worth a visit, even if rather expensive).
Buko pie, espasol, ampaw, pinipig, kesong puti (white cheese) shing-a-ling and tamarind sweets.

value: address=Km. 91 Maharlika Highway, Brgy. San Antonio II, San Pablo City, Laguna, Philippines
price=Best rates on official website start at Php 1,350

content=Rockpoint Hotsprings Resort-Hotel and Spa is strategically located where refreshing hot spring water flows constantly at the foot of Mount Makiling. They make every stay an enjoyable experience, offering cozy guest rooms complete with modern amenities, and facilities that include game rooms, karaoke bar and lounge, natural hot spring swimming pools, and the in-house Lava Grill and Restaurant and coffee shop, among many others.
